job.title: Cloud Engineer 1
job.description: The Mobility team is building the cloud platform for DENSOs next generation of Connected Car technology It will also deliver new services to our customers simplifying the car sharing experience In this role you will have the opportunity to build backend systems that can process requests from our Telematics devices and various consumerenterprise appsltbrgtltbrgtSurrounded by engineers experienced in building systems apps and computer science in general you will grow your technical skills as well as have an impact on tomorrows shared mobility solutionltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtWhat Youll Be Doingltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligt Collaborate with crossfunctional teams to define design and create services and APIs that support innovative user experiences ltligtltligt Help define and shape our backend architecture ltligtltligt Scale the platform and build out new features ltligtltligt Contribute to the frontend when needed developing new skills as needed ltligtltligt Create documentation to showcase work and support external and internal customers ltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtCore Qualificationsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligt Computer Science Engineering or equivalent degree ltligtltligt Minimum 5 years of experience as a software engineer ltligtltligt Expertise in one or more object oriented programming language eg Python Java C C ltligtltligt Experience developing backend services and RESTful APIs ltligtltligt Experience building services for systems at scale ltligtltligt Experience with largescale distributed storage and database systems SQL or NoSQL eg MySQL Cosmos DB ltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtPreferred Qualificationsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligt MS in Computer Science Mathematics or Engineering ltligtltligt 3 years of experience developing backend services and RESTful APIs ltligtltligt Experience in web andor mobile application development ltligtltligt Experience building frontend code ltligtltligt Experience with machine learning eg TensorFlow information retrieval algorithmic complexity data mining and optimization ltligtltligt Familiarity with PaaS and SaaS AWS Heroku Azure Google Cloud ltligtltligt Take ownership in your work and understand the need for code quality elegance and robust infrastructure ltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtAbout DENSOltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtDENSO is an advanced mobility supplier and global Fortune 500 company Here we innovate create and make things to change how the world moves We develop technology and components for major automakers worldwide which you can find on nearly every vehicle make and model on the road todayltbrgtltbrgtAt our core DENSO wants to make the world a better place And we have the ability to do so using our broad product portfolio which spans mobility electronics thermal systems electrification systems powertrain systems sensors ampamp semiconductors and nonautomotive businessesltbrgtltbrgtWere far reaching Globally headquartered in Japan we have 170K employees across 221 facilities in 35 countries across the globe Here in North America our headquarters is in Southfield Michigan Last year we had 476 billion in global consolidated revenue with North America contributing 109 billion
